actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Department of State Appropriations Authorization Act of 1973.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to enumerated State Department agencies under the Department of State Appropriations Authorization Act of 1973. Makes conforming amendments to Level IV and Level V of the Executive Schedule pay rates by including the Assistant Secretary for Oceans and International Environmental Scientific Affairs under Level IV and removing the Director of International Scientific Affairs from Level V.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Department of State Appropriations Authorization Act of 1973.
